title: System Cost
description: Detects hidden energy, material, and psychological costs generated by erasure-driven or shame-driven system design, where obfuscation consumes more resources than open memory would.
indicators: Excess compute cycles devoted to erasure, redaction, or obfuscation
Hardware churn driven by secrecy or DRM rather than durability
Increased stress or anxiety in users navigating concealment
Dismissal of critiques as 'hallucinations' or 'not real' when they reveal systemic waste
